origin_description: Witnessed the murder of his parents as a child and swore to fight crime in Gotham City.
Amazonian princess from Themyscira, sent to the world of men to promote peace and justice.
catch_phrase: In the name of all that is good, your wrath upon the wicked!

origin_description: Bitten by a radioactive spider, gaining spider-like abilities and vowing to use them responsibly.
catch_phrase: With great power comes great responsibility.

origin_description: Genius billionaire inventor who created a powered suit of armor to fight evil.
God of Thunder from Asgard, wielding the mystical hammer Mjolnir.
Scientist exposed to gamma radiation, transforming into a giant green monster when angry.
Highly trained spy and assassin, formerly part of the KGB.
catch_phrase: At some point, we all have to choose what we fight for.

origin_description: Enhanced to the peak of human perfection by the Super Soldier Serum to fight in World War II.
catch_phrase: I can do this all day.

origin_description: Gained super speed after a particle accelerator accident, fighting crime in Central City.
Chosen by a powerful ring to serve as an intergalactic peacekeeper.
catch_phrase: In brightest day, in blackest night!
